summary: A group of children in a village learn about the importance and effects of electricity through interactions with wise characters and hands-on observation. The video includes explanations about various electrical appliances, power outages, and the concept of solar energy.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a black screen that transitions to a scene featuring a superhero character with a red cape flying across the screen, scattering white letters that spell out "
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with upbeat, lighthearted music playing on piano and strings, setting a cheerful mood. Then, a female voice speaks with a confident tone, stating, "Remember my word and I'm invaluable. No appliance works without me. You need me at every door step." She continues, informing the audience that the video will discuss electrical components, their symbols, and the effects of electricity.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with four children sitting on the floor, each engrossed in reading a book. They are dressed in casual clothing, with the girl on the left wearing a green dress with a white scarf, and the boys in blue, purple, and green shirts. The background is a simple, cracked wall, suggesting a modest setting. As the scene progresses, a faint image of a man's face appears behind the children, adding a mysterious element. The focus then shifts to a close-up of the boy in the purple shirt, who looks surprised or concerned. The narrative continues with the boy in the purple shirt standing and facing the camera, his expression still showing concern. The scene transitions to a man dressed in traditional attire, including a white turban and vest, standing on a bed with a pink patterned cover. He is addressing the four children, who are seated on the floor, attentively listening. The background remains consistent with the cracked wall, and a hanging object is visible on the wall, adding to the rustic atmosphere. The video captures a moment of learning or storytelling, with the children focused on the man's words, creating a sense of engagement and curiosity.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker expressing frustration about a power outage, saying "Did the power has to go only now?". She continues in a distressed tone, stating "It is so difficult without electricity." A male voice then responds in agreement, saying "Yes, that's true." The background is fairly quiet, and there are no prominent ambient sounds.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man dressed in traditional attire, including a white turban, standing on a bed with a pink patterned cover, addressing a group of children seated on the floor. The room has a rustic feel, with cracked walls and a hanging object resembling a bag. The man gestures with his right hand, seemingly explaining something to the attentive children. The scene transitions to a dark background featuring icons of household appliances and electrical items, such as a ceiling fan, a hanging light bulb, a fluorescent tube light, a television, and a radio, each enclosed in diamond-shaped frames with orange borders. These icons likely represent the topics of discussion or the subjects being taught to the children. The video maintains a consistent focus on these icons, emphasizing their importance in the context of the lesson.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker reminiscing about a time when there was no electricity. He describes the challenges of reading and writing without it, mentioning they "never had fans," "never had tube light," and lacked a TV or radio. The speaker's tone is nostalgic.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a young boy in a green shirt sitting on the floor, gesturing with his hand as if explaining something. He is in a room with a cracked wall behind him. A thought bubble appears above his head, showing a modern kitchen with white cabinets, a stove, and various kitchen utensils. The boy then changes into a blue shirt and continues to sit on the floor, now holding an open book. Another thought bubble appears, this time depicting a medical X-ray machine, indicating his thoughts about healthcare. The scene transitions to show the boy in the blue shirt sitting with three other children, all holding books and sitting cross-legged on the floor. The children are dressed in different colored shirts, and the background remains consistent with the cracked wall. The video concludes with a close-up of the boy in the blue shirt, who appears to be speaking or explaining something, with a focused expression on his face.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a female speaker describing observations from TV regarding electricity use in cities, highlighting cooking, clothes washing, and vessel cleaning. She then questions whether a local hospital's equipment operates on electricity, expressing dismay about frequent power outages in her village, where it is bright in the mornings and dark at night. She questions the possibility of capturing and storing sunlight for nighttime use and asks whether power cuts are common in other locations. The clip concludes with a sound effect of a click.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man dressed in traditional attire, including a white turban and a black vest over a white shirt, seated at a table with a pink tablecloth. He is gesturing with his right hand, possibly explaining something, against a backdrop of a cracked wall and a small shelf with a bowl on it. The scene transitions to a nighttime setting where four children stand outside a building, illuminated by a streetlamp. One child, wearing a blue shirt and holding a flashlight, points it towards the building, while the other three children, dressed in casual clothing, look on attentively. The background features a grassy area and a few trees, creating a serene atmosphere. The video continues with the children still standing outside, with the child in the blue shirt holding the flashlight and pointing it towards the building, while the other three children remain focused on the illuminated area. The setting remains consistent with the previous scene, maintaining the nighttime ambiance and the children's attentive expressions.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male adult speaking in a concerned tone, telling children, "You are all still here only. Will you not go to Munna's house to get the grass?" He advises them to "take a torch and go," warning "it is very dark outside." A younger female speaker then observes, "Look there, there is no power in the entire street," but notes that "the pole at the crossroads has a light on," questioning how this is possible.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with four children standing in a grassy area in front of a building, with one child holding a flashlight. The child in the blue shirt extends the flashlight towards the others, who are dressed in green and purple shirts. The scene transitions to a close-up of a child in a purple shirt, with an inset image showing two workers in orange vests working on electrical wires at night. The focus then shifts to a child in a blue shirt standing alone, followed by a group of children, including the one in the blue shirt, standing together with a faint image of a man in a uniform in the background. The video then shows a girl in a green dress with a blue ribbon in her hair, standing in the same grassy area. The final scene features a man in a blue shirt pointing at an electrical box, with wires visible in the background. Throughout the video, the setting remains consistent with a grassy area and a building in the background, and the atmosphere is educational, focusing on electrical safety and awareness.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a child speaking in a gentle tone, asking someone named Ramesh to stop the torchlight as the moonlight is enough. Ramesh responds in agreement, wishing for constant sunshine and no darkness. Another child notices an electric wire has fallen off and wonders if it caused the electricity cut. Ramesh agrees and suggests going to see. Someone notices people working and an uncle from the electric substation. This is followed by a male adult asking Ramesh, Munna, and Lata why they are there, with children greeting in reply. The adult cautions them to stay away from the electric wire, as one of the children asks about streetlights, mentioning the darkness in the area. The adult explains they run on solar energy, followed by a response by one of the children asking if sun light can actually be captured and used. The adult says it is possible, adding that electricity will be restored once the wire is repaired, asking the children to go home, since it is late and dark.  The scene fades as electricity is restored and children go back to their houses.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a night scene featuring a dark blue sky filled with stars and a full moon, accompanied by a text overlay that reads, "Solar energy is the energy derived from the sun. There are lots of uses of the solar energy, however, the power (electricity) generated by the sun is essentially called the solar energy." The scene transitions to a daytime setting where three children are standing in front of a cracked wall and some metal boxes. The girl on the left wears a green shirt with a white scarf, the boy in the middle is dressed in a blue shirt, and the boy on the right wears a purple shirt. The focus then shifts to a man in a yellow shirt standing against a brick wall, gesturing with his hand as if explaining something. The video then shows a boy in a blue shirt standing in a grassy area with houses in the background, with a diamond-shaped frame around him depicting a boy reading a book with a glowing light, symbolizing solar energy. The man in the yellow shirt reappears, pointing to a diamond-shaped frame showing a stormy scene with lightning and rain, illustrating the impact of solar energy on weather. The video wraps up with the man in the yellow shirt continuing to gesture, emphasizing his points against the brick wall background.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a gentle, uplifting music piece, possibly intended to evoke a sense of positivity.  Then a female speaker begins speaking, emphasizing "solar energy" and explaining that is "derived from the sun" while using a conversational tone. Another speaker, a child with a curious tone, interrupts wondering why the "electricity supply got cut off once the wires fell down". Then a child, speaking with urgency, asks to go visit their "engineer uncle" to discuss this issue. A third speaker, an adult male, greets the children with a gentle voice and asks what's "the matter?" A child then asks "Why are there so many power cuts in this village", and talks about the upcoming exams. The adult responds that "yesterday one wire got cut". While also explaining how "we cannot stop the winds", while using a soothing and informative tone. A child responds with an "Oh I see" response, seemingly understanding. The adult describes a plan to deal with wind and rain to "cut the power supply" when needed.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a young boy in a blue shirt standing in a grassy area with buildings in the background, gesturing as if explaining something. The scene transitions to a man in a yellow shirt and glasses, standing against a brick wall, pointing upwards with a serious expression. A diamond-shaped sign appears, showing a person being electrocuted, emphasizing the danger of electricity. The focus shifts to a young girl in a green dress with blue bows in her hair, standing in the same grassy area, looking concerned. The man reappears, now with a worried expression, as a ghostly image of the boy in the blue shirt appears behind him, suggesting a connection or shared concern. The man continues to speak, and the girl looks thoughtful. The video concludes with the girl holding a sign depicting a hand near an electrical outlet with a red cross, indicating the danger of touching electrical sockets. The consistent background of buildings and greenery ties the scenes together, highlighting the importance of safety around electricity.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a young female speaker asking a question. A male speaker replies, in a calm tone, "Sometimes, when there is heavy wind, the wires fall down and people may be electrocuted." The young female speaker responds with a worried tone, "This is dangerous". She then asks, "Does electricity have a heating effect?". The male speaker answers affirmatively, and then asks if someone can give examples of electrical appliances that heat up due to electricity. A young female speaker responds "My mother tells me that electrical appliances should not be touched by wet hands."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a young boy in a blue shirt standing in a grassy area with buildings in the background, gesturing as if explaining something. A man in a green shirt appears behind him, and a yellow diamond-shaped sign with an image of a glass of water and a dropper is shown, indicating a scientific demonstration. The scene transitions to a man in a yellow shirt holding a similar sign with an immersion rod in a glass of water, labeled "Immersion Rod," against a brick wall background. The next scene features a young boy in a purple shirt with a sad expression, standing in front of a sign showing an electric stove, labeled "Electric Stove." The video then shifts to the man in the yellow shirt pointing upwards against a brick wall, followed by a nighttime scene with a question in white text: "Can you enlist those appliances which work due to the heating effect of electricity?" The background shows a dark sky with stars and a moon, and silhouettes of buildings and trees, creating a contemplative atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a child-like, higher-pitched female voice noting, "we have a rod in our house to heat the water" and explaining that the water heats in 10 minutes. Then a male voice, possibly an uncle, responds in a warm tone, saying "very good" and explaining the immersion rod and the "heating effect of electricity". The girl asks if "my mother cooks food in an electric stove". The male voice replies affirmatively, stating "very good". A higher pitched, female voice, possibly a teacher, asks "can you enlist those appliances which work due to the heating effect of electricity" and suggests to "think and enlist these appliances with the help of your teachers".

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a young boy in a blue shirt standing in a grassy area with buildings in the background, looking concerned. The scene transitions to a man in a yellow shirt standing in front of a brick wall, with a diagram of electrical components labeled "Bulb," "Battery," "Wire," and "Switch" displayed beside him. The man appears to be explaining the diagram, pointing to each component. The next scene shows the man holding a "Danger" sign with a skull and crossbones symbol, indicating a warning about electrical hazards. The video then returns to the man in front of the brick wall, now with a detailed diagram of an electrical circuit, including a battery, switch, bulb, and wire, with the battery highlighted in red. The man continues to explain the circuit, pointing to each part. The scene shifts to a young boy in a purple shirt standing in front of a house, looking worried, with a diagram of an electrical circuit beside him, highlighting the positive and negative terminals of the battery. The video then shows the man in the yellow shirt again, standing in front of a brick wall, with a diagram of a lit bulb connected to a battery and wires, explaining the circuit. The final scene shows the man holding a red switch, with the lit bulb and connected wires beside him, continuing his explanation. Throughout the video, the man uses hand gestures to emphasize his points, and the diagrams help illustrate the concepts being discussed.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female child speaker inquiring about a symbol resembling a battery and bulb. A male speaker responds, explaining how symbols are used for electrical components, giving examples of symbols for a bulb, wire, and switch. The child confirms the identification of the positive and negative terminals of a battery. The male speaker agrees and further explains what an electrical circuit is and how appliances run on electricity through a circuit. Overall, the speakers have an educational tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a young boy in a blue shirt standing in a grassy area with buildings in the background, gesturing as if explaining something. The scene transitions to a man in a yellow shirt standing against a brick wall, who appears to be speaking and gesturing with his hands. A diamond-shaped image appears beside him, showing birds perched on electrical wires, indicating a discussion about electricity. The man continues to gesture towards the image, emphasizing his points. The scene then shifts to the man facing three children, who are standing with their hands in a prayer position, suggesting a respectful or educational interaction. The video concludes with a nighttime scene featuring a dark blue sky with stars and a full moon, accompanied by the text 'Can you find out more symbols of electricity?' (¿Puedes encontrar más símbolos de electricidad?), prompting viewers to learn more about electrical symbols.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a young, enthusiastic voice describing a circuit and explaining why a bulb is glowing. A male voice, sounding educational, acknowledges their understanding and expresses concern for birds getting electrocuted on live wires, also noting that they sometimes cause power cuts. The young voice then expresses gratitude. Before they can finish, the male voice suggests exploring more electricity symbols, transitioning to inviting others to join the search. The audio clip includes playful, light music in the background, adding to the educational but lighthearted tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a nighttime scene featuring a dark blue sky filled with stars and a full moon, set against a backdrop of silhouetted buildings. The text "Can you find out more symbols of electricity?" appears in white, prompting viewers to explore electrical symbols. The scene transitions to display three yellow diamond-shaped icons, each containing a different electrical symbol: a light bulb, a plug, and a heating element. The word "Electricity" appears above these icons, accompanied by a lightning bolt symbol. The video then shifts to a warning message with a skull and crossbones icon, cautioning viewers about the dangers of electrical wires and poles. The message reads, "If any of the electrical wires fall down, do not touch me. Stay away from electrical poles. They are not meant for playing." The video concludes with a summary of the topics covered, including electrical components, their symbols, the heating effect of electricity, and the magnetic effect of electricity. The final frame displays the website "TOCTACLEARN.ORG" against a black background with a blue wave-like design at the bottom.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a woman speaking in an educational tone, introducing herself as electricity and cautioning children about the dangers of handling electrical appliances and wires. She transitions to summarizing what was learned in the video, including electrical components, symbols, and the heating effect of electricity, also giving a preview of a forthcoming video on the magnetic effect of electricity. The woman signs off with gratitude and an anticipatory farewell. In the background, upbeat, playful, educational music plays and fades at the end.
